@Hmoobphajej
Hello man. I always provide pure scene releases. Recent AVs are very restrictive to packed/crypted files, so scene productions are often detected as viruses, but this is false alarms. Scene releases have SFV files, you can check the flawless of upload (example with Total Commander). Cheers.
